name: Hyper Void(RPG Maker Game)
description: Play As A Young Fairy Locked In Prison For Supernatural Entity's. This Game Is Complete And Has Been Bug Tested, Gameplay lasts About 15-30 Minutes Depending on if You Interact with everything(I Recommend you do that.) The Screenshots look simple but there is much more to this game, And i Don't Want To Ruin It. PS. At the end of the game when it gives you the 3 yes option press the only no To Progress.
